description: Reboots the specified WorkSpaces. You cannot reboot a WorkSpace unless its state is AVAILABLE, UNHEALTHY, or REBOOTING. Reboot a WorkSpace in the REBOOTING state only if your WorkSpace has been stuck in the REBOOTING state for over 20 minutes. This operation is asynchronous and returns before the WorkSpaces have rebooted.

parameters.name: RebootWorkspaceRequests
parameters.description: The WorkSpaces to reboot. You can specify up to 25 WorkSpaces. (dict) --- Describes the information used to reboot a WorkSpace. WorkspaceId (string) --- The identifier of the WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: FailedRequests
nested_items.description: Information about the WorkSpaces that could not be rebooted.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code that is returned if the WorkSpace cannot be rebooted.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The text of the error message that is returned if the WorkSpace cannot be rebooted.
